title: Extensible API providers (config + plugin)
description:
Allow adding OpenAI-compatible API providers via:
1. Config: Edit config.toml with id, name, base_url, env_var, type
2. Plugin: Drop-in file with pre-configured provider (for non-technical users)

Examples: xAI, Together, Fireworks, self-hosted LLMs.
Plugins are pre-packaged configs that can be shared/distributed.

logs.msg: Potential provider: Modal (https://modal.com/blog/try-glm-5) â€” OpenAI-compatible inference endpoint, worth evaluating as a provider adapter
